title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
quoteDoc: Privacy Policy: Software and Technology Projects
quoteText: We may occasionally update this document or the relevant user interfaces to reflect changes in the information that we collect or new products or technologies we release. However, any revised privacy policy will be consistent with EFF's mission and will be available atÂ https://www.eff.org/code/privacy-policy.
